subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Bicycle Motocross
lead_paragraph: Mr. Breithaupt helped found and became the pre-eminent early promoter of bicycle motocross racing. He also manufactured BMX bikes and became a television commentator on BMX.
snippet: Mr. Breithaupt helped found and became the pre-eminent early promoter of bicycle motocross racing. He also manufactured BMX bikes and became a television commentator on BMX.
